Package project_2

Class TuitionManager

java.lang.Object
project_2.TuitionManager
public class TuitionManager
extends java.lang.Object
This is the main running class that handles valid inputs and operations based on the requirements given in Project 2. It takes in inputs with the format for adding -> (Instruction, Name, Major, CreditHours, ExtraField (applying to AT and AI). Add Instruction: AR -> Add Resident Student AN -> Add non-Resident Student AT -> Add tristate student, (extra field allows NY and CT) AI -> Add international student, (extra field is a boolean, true if they study abroad, false if not) R -> Remove a resident student from the roster It takes in action instructions. Action Instructions: R, name, major -> Removes resident student from the roster C -> Calculate tuition for all students from the roster T, Name, Major, Payment, Date -> Pay tuition S, Name, Major, StudyAbroadStatus -> Set Study abroad status F, Name, Major, FinancialAid -> Set financial aid amount P -> print roster as is PN -> print roster sorted by student names PT -> print only the students who have made payments, ordered by payment dates.
Author:
Kevin Cubillos, Ethan Chang

    • checkInstruction

      private boolean checkInstruction​(java.util.StringTokenizer st)
      Checks the instruction and executes corresponding procedures. Does nothing if command is invalid.
      Parameters:
      st - the string tokenizer currently before command token.
      Returns:
      returns true to continue running, or false to stop running client.

      Checks if a profile of a student is valid.
      Parameters:
      st - the string tokenizer currently before name token.
      Returns:
      an array containing name and major, null if invalid.

    • validCredit

      private int validCredit​(java.util.StringTokenizer st, boolean isInternational)
      Checks if amount of credits is valid.
      Parameters:
      st - the string tokenizer currently before credits token.
      isInternational - tracks if student is international.
      Returns:
      amount of credits, INVALID_CREDIT ( = 0) if invalid.
